## AbstractDevice.reverseVertexWindingOrder() method

Set wether to reverse the winding order

**Signature:**

```typescript
reverseVertexWindingOrder(reverse: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  reverse | boolean | true if the winding order should be reversed. |

**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

The default winding order is counter-clockwise.
